nodes.text: Doctor: "What up dogs! It´s Big Snoop D-O-Double G! Hello Welcome to the office of Dr. TeethHurtNONO. How can I help you today?"

options.text: Hello Dr.! My teeth hurt yesyes, but I need Teeth Hurt NONO. Please do something.
Hey old dude! Your opening hours are trash as Sh*t. I need an appointment ASAP.

nodes.text: Doctor: "That's a shame to hear young person on the phone. I will do my best to fix it. But first I need your security number to secure the date höhö. Sorry for the dad joke."

options.text: Sure! My security number is "123456."
Sure! My security number is "Free-the-house-elves".
Sure! My security number is "You shall not pass".

nodes.text: Doctor: "Thank you! Please describe your pain, is it a sharp, a dull ache, or something else?"

options.text: It feels like your mum is chopping onions on my tooth.
It feels like your husband is a tiny DJ and scratching records on my molar.
It feels like if your dad is part of a circus and performing stunts on my tooth.

nodes.text: Doctor: "Okay I think I can totally comprehend with what you´re describing. Do you have any allergies?"

options.text: Yes, I am allergic to Kafka´s novels. They are all horrible!
Yes, I am allergic to the existential dread in Dostoevsky´s work.
Yes, I am allergic to Shakespearean poetry where not at least one person dies.
Yes, I am allergic to peanuts and sterile environments.

nodes.text: Doctor: "I see, I see! And have you tried to be a doctor yourself and to alleviate the pain at home?"

options.text: Excuseeeee meee!? Are you insane!? I could have died!
Yes! I attempted to use a potion from my Harry Potter cookbook. Didn't work.
Yes, I tried to fix it with some duct tape and a YouTube tutorial.
Yes but then the painkiller asked me to not eat it and so save it´s life.

nodes.text: Doctor: "Okay perfect. One last question before we finalize your appointment. If your toothache was a mythical creature, which one would it be?"

options.text: A dragon, breathing fire in my mouth.
A unicorn, but with a horn that's stuck in my gum.
A sad cat, whining with every bite.
Your mum.

nodes.text: Doctor: "Alrighty then! Your appointment's set for tomorrow. See you then, and don't forget to give those teeth some TLC – maybe even tell them a joke or two! After all, a smile is just a giggle waiting to happen!"
Doctor: "Awesome! Your appointment's set for February 1st, 2036. See you then, and until that day, treat your teeth like royalty – maybe even tell them a joke! After all, they deserve a crown!"
